Uses of Class
bdi4jade.core.Intention

  • Packages that use Intention 
    Package Description
    bdi4jade.core
    This package contains the key classes of BDI4JADE.
    bdi4jade.plan.planbody
    This package contains interfaces and classes that allows representation of plan body, which is an executable piece of code that is instantiated and executed to achieve goals.

    • Uses of Intention in bdi4jade.core

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Intention> BDIAgent.getIntentions()
      Returns all agent intentions, which are goals that this agent is committed to achieve.
      java.util.Set<Intention> AbstractBDIAgent.getIntentions()
